class.name: Popup
class.brief_description: Popup is a base window container for popup-like subwindows.
class.description: Popup is a base window container for popup-like subwindows. It's a modal by default (see [member close_on_parent_focus]) and has helpers for custom popup behavior.

members.member: If true, the [Popup] will close when its parent [Window] is focused.

signal.name: popup_hide
signal.description: Emitted when the popup is hidden.
